fields.name: LaunchProcess
fields.fieldText: Launch Tax Savings Analysis Presentation

fields.name: Owner_Error_Explain
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


Only the Owner of an Event or a System Admin can launch Guided Selling.

fields.name: Generic_Error_Text
fields.fieldText: An error has occurred that prevents Guided Selling from launching. Please try again, and if the error continues give the following information to your admin:

fields.name: DisplaySchedulerLinkText
fields.fieldText:
There is no TSA Event scheduled for today related to this object.


To schedule one, follow this link and then relaunch the process:


ï»¿{!Get_Primary_Email_Address.schedulerUrl}

fields.name: Duplicate_Error_Text
fields.fieldText: The lead associated with this event cannot be converted because a duplicate record was detected.

fields.name: Forgot_Opp
fields.fieldText:
You forgot to either create an Opportunity or link the Opportunity to the TSA, but we fixed that for you and connected the TSA to an Opportunity.


Click "Next" to continue.

fields.name: Forgot_to_Update_Lead
fields.fieldText:
We just made you the owner of the lead.


Click "Next" to continue.

fields.name: Quote_Error_Text
fields.fieldText: There is a Quote already created for the Opportunity. Please go to the Opportunity page and click the Update Quote button.

fields.name: ClientLink
fields.fieldText:
ï»¿Client Link:

ï»¿

{!siteBaseUrl}/Client?rId={!recordId}&session={!Get_Primary_Email_Address.sessionId}&token={!Get_Primary_Email_Address.presentationToken}

fields.name: Additional_Emails
fields.helpText: Please enter additional email addresses in a comma separated list.
